summary: Completed comprehensive testing of product catalog application with 42 products across 4 categories. Backend APIs working excellently (91.7% success rate), frontend UI functional with minor filtering issue.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 500 instead of 404 for non-existent products
minor_bugs.impact: Poor error handling for invalid product IDs

ui_bugs.component: Products Grid Page - All Products Filter
ui_bugs.issue: After clicking category filters, 'All Products' button doesn't reset to show all 42 products

passed_tests: All 42 products loaded correctly from database
Products properly distributed across 4 categories (Table Lamps: 11, Garden & Pendant Lights: 15, Wall Lights: 10, Chandeliers: 6)
Category filter buttons work correctly on homepage
Individual category filtering works correctly on grid page
Product cards display name, price, SKU, category correctly
View Details buttons navigate to product detail pages
Product detail pages show complete information (title, price, category, description, SKU)
Buy buttons (Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho) appear and have valid links
Buy Now modal opens and closes correctly
Backend APIs return correct product data structure
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix minor 'All Products' filter reset issue on products-grid.html and improve error handling for non-existent product IDs to return 404 instead of 500
